permafrost.tundra.lang

Class ExceptionHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.lang.ExceptionHelper

  • public class ExceptionHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of convenience methods for working with Integration Server service exceptions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private ExceptionHelper()
      Disallow instantiation of this class.

    • Method Summary

      Returns a message describing the given exception.

      Returns a message describing the given list of exceptions.

      Returns a message describing the given list of exceptions.
      static com.wm.data.IData[] getStackTrace(java.lang.Throwable exception)

      Throws a new ServiceException with the given message.

      Throws a new ServiceException whose message is constructed from the given cause.
      static void raise(java.lang.Throwable... causes)
      Throws a new ServiceException whose message is constructed from the given list of causes.
      static void raise(java.lang.Throwable cause)
      Throws a new ServiceException whose message is constructed from the given cause, unless the cause is already a ServiceException or is an unchecked exception, in which case it is rethrown without modification.

      • raise

        public static void raise(java.lang.Throwable... causes)
                  throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Throws a new ServiceException whose message is constructed from the given list of causes.
        Parameters:
        causes - The list of exceptions which caused this new ServiceException to be thrown.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - Always throws a new ServiceException using the given list of causes.

      • raise

        public static void raise(java.lang.String message,
                         java.lang.Throwable cause)
                  throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Throws a new ServiceException whose message is constructed from the given cause.
        Parameters:
        message - A message describing why this new ServiceException was thrown.
        cause - The exception which caused this new ServiceException to be thrown.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - Always throws a new ServiceException using the given message and cause.

      • raise

        public static void raise(java.lang.Throwable cause)
                  throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Throws a new ServiceException whose message is constructed from the given cause, unless the cause is already a ServiceException or is an unchecked exception, in which case it is rethrown without modification.
        Parameters:
        cause - The exception which caused this new ServiceException to be thrown.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - The given Throwable if it is already a ServiceException or an unchecked exception, otherwise a new ServiceException constructed with the given Throwable as its cause.

      • raise

        public static void raise(java.lang.String message)
                  throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Throws a new ServiceException with the given message.
        Parameters:
        message - A message describing why this new ServiceException was thrown.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - Always throws a new ServiceException using the given message.

      • raise

        public static void raise()
                  throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Throws a new ServiceException with an empty message.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - Always throws a new ServiceException.

      • getStackTrace

        public static com.wm.data.IData[] getStackTrace(java.lang.Throwable exception)
        Returns the call stack associated with the given exception as an IData[] document list.
        Parameters:
